##  {{< fa scroll >}} Description
Under the reproducible umbrella, this lesson aims to provide tools and a framework for writing reproducible papers. The idea is to leverage different R packages to help you organize your research from start to finish. Mainly focusing on formatting publication manuscripts for specific journals.

## {{< fa check >}} Prerequisites
- Basic knowledge of R and RStudio
- Familiarity with Rmarkdown and/or Quarto


## {{< fa bullseye >}} Learning Goals
- Introduce the concept of a research compendium
- Learn how to use R to package your work by building a reproducible paper in RMarkdown/Quarto

## <i class="fa-regular fa-clock"></i> Duration
1 hour
